comments.comment: comments kara kara indala vadak ne. millions ganan janathava parata bahela kudu buisnes karayan horu komis gahana evun pita rataval valin ganna naya valin gasa kana evun janatha mudal avabavithaya karana evun parliament eken pannala dana kal CTB CGR CEB okkomala ekathu vela udgosanaya kala yuthui. eka davasak novei masayada dekada eetath vadiya ho parata bahala udgosanaya kala yuthui pannala dana kal. nathnam un hithanne janathava ge vadi hariyak manda buddika gobbayo kiyalai. obala lajja viya yuthui ehema udgosanayak ada vena thuru karanna bariveema gana. vena vikalpayak ne. buddimath va ikmanin theeranayak ganna. thanks.

comments.comment:
Sthuthie nam heli kalata. Namuth ai methuma thamange sahodara amathiyage nama nokiwe? 
 Wipaksheta gahala weerayek wenne kohomada ? Baya nethnam konda kelin thiyan katha karana pudgalayeknam ai thama sagayan beranne?
  Oka thamai me rate deshapalana hingana nadege mahaloku keruwaawa.
  Dan aandu pakshe ekathu wela horu minimaruwo kiyala Rajapakshala hanwadu gahaddi anith peththen aanduwe horu mini maruwo ethanol mudalalila hari lassanata aaraksha kara gannawa.
   Mun okkoma ma rata kanna aawa wasala nadayak . Deshaddrohiyo tikak.
  Ranjange thiththa aththath heluwen bawa ada penuna. Nodakin. 
  Me news eka balala honda naraka kiyala paksha paata bedagena inna mandabuddikayanta kiyanna thinne UNP JVP  SLFP SLPP TNA muslim congress me pakaha tiken denwath ain wela me sakkili nade gewalwalata yanna paarak kapa ganilla yakune.
  Mun heththa oya diyawannawe inna thaakkal apita hinga kannama thamai wenne. Munta sepa ganna api duk windinne.  Therum ganilla  denwath mun mokunda kiyala.
comments.author: Nirmala Pushpakumari
